profile.description: Junior Developer. Passionate about new technologies, especially the ecosystem of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. My goal is to achieve a high level of knowledge in web technologies and to apply them in the field of programming through best practices.

experience.first-job-description: In May 2024, I participated in the development of a web system for the educational center 30073 San Pedro de Yauyo, Chupaca, serving as a Front End designer, using Figma as a prototyping tool for the user interfaces. This experience allowed me to gain a more comprehensive understanding of software development, where the goal is not only to provide the most optimal logic for good performance but also to work from a client perspective, focusing on the aesthetics and intuitive handling of web systems.

hobbies.first-hobbies-description: I like riding a bicycle because it allows me to explore new places and enjoy the outdoors. I have visited several parks and trails by bike and have enjoyed the challenge of overcoming obstacles and improving my cycling skills. Riding a bicycle is a way I stay active and healthy, and I love the feeling of freedom and the thrill of speed.

projects.first-project-description: In this section, the work related to the Web Application Development course is stored.
